text: khụ̄x brrdā p̄hū̂ thī̀ kl̀āw ẁā xô phracêā h̄æ̀ng phwk k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ thæ̂cring phwk k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ ṣ̄rạthṭhā kạn læ̂w pord thrng xp̣hạythos̄ʹ h̄ı̂ kæ̀ phwk k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ d̂wy t̄heid sụ̀ng brrdā khwām p̄hid k̄hxng phwk k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ læa pord dị̂ thrng p̂xngkạn phwk k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ h̄ı̂ pĥn cāk kār lngthos̄ʹ h̄æ̀ng fị nrk d̂wy
